basic.description:
A study of eight of Shakespeare's plays in relation to the social, intellectual, and political climate of the Elizabethan period and with reference to theatrical production.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Elizabethan Shakespeare

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE  A grade of C in 6.0 units from ENGL100 (or ENGL110)
EXCLUSION  no more than 6.0 units from ENGL256/6.0; 257/3.0; 258/3.0
Equivalency    ENGL 226.
